title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When clicking on other buttons, the bell sound is also heard.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not beep when choosing SWT.MULTI.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Build F1 (20020521) Win2K.
2. Launch the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Go to the Text tab.
4. Click on the 'Styles' section.
5. Select SWT.SINGLE.
6. Click back on 'Styles' and select SWT.MULTI.
